subject: Science
question: Question: When the process is adiabatic, this law is restated as delta W equals negative delta U. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this law of thermodynamics, a restatement of the conservation of energy which states that the change in internal energy is equal to the sum of heat added and work done on the system.
